QuestData.Title: One Step Ahead
QuestData.Description: Boss, Durotan set off with Draka and Gazlowe to track da Iron Horde's movements along da coast.$B$BDey waitin' for ya on the cliffs to da northwest.
QuestData.RewardText: Ah, $n. I recognized your scent, friend. We have been waiting for your arrival to begin our task.
